name: Chardonnay Cerro Chapeu
review: Modest apple and butter notes, with a dash of toast on the finish. Drink now. 1,300 cases imported.

name: Tannat Cerro Chapeu
review: Thin, with modest cherry fruit and a trim finish. 1,300 cases imported.

name: Sauvignon Blanc Cerro Chapeu
review: Modest lemon zest flavor, with a faintly sweet finish. 1,300 cases imported.

name: Chardonnay Las Violetas
review: Simple green apple flavor is a touch tart. Slightly dilute finish. 2,000 cases made.

name: Sauvignon Blanc Cerro Chapeu
review: Faint lemon flavor with an earthy backdrop. 2,000 cases made.

name: Côtes de Provence
review: Light, with berry and dried cherry flavors. Has a slightly stewy note on the finish.
